channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Elon Musk faces exile from 365-year-old Royal Society scientific institution over his political behavior
item.description: More than 2,700 scientists sign open letter calling for Musk's removal after being described as a "Bond villain" by a former member.

item.title: Baked by Melissa founder once shirked the CEO role: ‘I didn’t think I was good enough.’ Now she’s not looking back
item.description: "Despite founding the business, Melissa Ben-Ishay struggled to feel like she deserved to be at the top of her cupcake empire.

item.title: 'Drill, baby, drill' and tariffs: Which stocks stand to gain or lose
America’s population growth is slowing. That’s bad news for these investments.
Why conglomerates fail
item.description: Also: Palantir execs call out Silicon Valley, JPMorgan employee’s RTO debacle

item.title: Airbnb’s 43-year-old CEO rejects fellow tech titans’ lack of sleep: It makes ‘every hour the next day a little less productive’
item.description: Brian Chesky has a hack for managing the hectic day-to-day of a $100 billion Fortune 500 brand.

item.title: Here’s what’s open (and closed) on President’s Day 2025
item.description: Don’t expect to do any government business.

item.title: Here’s how Intel’s stock charts look after its big rally. Should you buy it?
Earnings watch: Can anything stop Walmart’s rally?
‘Trump trades’ like dollar and bitcoin are stalling, while Chinese stocks gain
